categories: Category:Battles of the Dark Plague crisis

nodes.text: In 3643 BBY, the starship Carida was attacked by Sith forces. Jedi Knight Laranna Fain defended the ship but was wounded in the process. The surviving Republic soldiers led by Lieutenant Bela Whinn called for assistance. Sith Lord Vivicar, posing as a Jedi Master, arrived to the Carida and healed the woman but also infected her with the Dark Plague before leaving, causing her to turn on her own troops.
